## RDM

Data organisation:

- File naming: <https://library.stanford.edu/research/data-management-services/data-best-practices/best-practices-file-naming>
- Storage solutions for researchers at TU Delft (requires login): <https://tudelft.topdesk.net/tas/public/ssp/content/detail/service?unid=f359caaa60264f99b0084941736786ae&from=feffb489-e1f9-49cd-8223-53ae0b70b609>
- Git version control: <https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-About-Version-Control>
- Personal data: <https://www.tudelft.nl/en/library/research-data-management/r/manage/confidential-data/personal-data/>

Course material:

- TUDelft RDM 101: <https://zenodo.org/record/6325919#.YxX64bRByUk>
- Esther Plomp's adaptation of RDM 101: <https://estherplomp.github.io/TNW-RDM-101/>
- The Turing Way: <https://the-turing-way.netlify.app/reproducible-research/rdm.html>

Electronic lab notebooks: 

- <https://www.tudelft.nl/en/library/research-data-management/r/manage/electronic-lab-notebook>
- <https://openworking.wordpress.com/2019/07/05/keep-calm-and-go-paperless-electronic-lab-notebooks-can-improve-your-research/>

Documentation

- READMEs: <https://data.4tu.nl/info/fileadmin/user_upload/Documenten/Guidelines_for_creating_a_README_file.pdf>
- READMEs for code: <https://github.com/PurpleBooth/a-good-readme-template>

Data publishing/archiving

- 4TU.ResearchData: <https://data.4tu.nl/info/en/use/publish-cite/upload-your-data-in-our-data-repository/>
- Licenses: <https://data.4tu.nl/info/en/use/publish-cite/upload-your-data-in-our-data-repository/licencing/>

Help:

- TU Delft Data Stewards: <https://www.tudelft.nl/en/library/research-data-management/r/support/data-stewardship/>
- Data management plans: <https://www.tudelft.nl/en/library/research-data-management/r/plan/data-management-plans>
- Research Data Management FAQs: <https://www.tudelft.nl/en/library/research-data-management/r/buttons/faqs>
